name: noon-basic-components
description: Noon Education Platform's basic components to act as boilerplate in new and old projects. Contains elements such as buttons, colors, form elements and table design parts.
author: Shoeb Raza <mail@shoebraza.com>, Usama Sulaiman <sulaiman.usama@gmail.com> (http://usamasulaiman.com)

scripts.sass: node-sass --output-style expanded src/noon-uikit.scss dist/noon-uikit.css && node-sass --output-style compressed src/noon-uikit.scss dist/noon-uikit.min.css
scripts.lint: sass-lint -c .sasslintrc src --verbose --no-exit && eslint test -c styled && editorconfig-tools check .
scripts.setup: npm i && npm install copyfiles yarn -g
